title: Command Manager (opensource gui management for ssh clients) ‚Äî Designed & Developed by Sedat E.
author: Sedat
excerpt: üëè CommandManager is a smart and lightweight desktop tool for managing and executing commands via SSH connections.
content:
---

### üëá Download Windows Desktop Executable Setup

[‚û°Ô∏è Latest Release](https://github.com/eaeoz/command-manager-windows/releases/download/1.0.0/CommandManager_1.0.0.exe "Download Command Manager Latest Release")

---

This Windows or Docker application lets you easily **create, edit, delete, and organize SSH profiles** ‚Äî then link your commands to those profiles for quick remote execution.  
With **drag & drop** sorting, **profile-based execution**, and a smooth interface, it‚Äôs perfect for developers and sysadmins alike.

## ‚ú® Features

- üîë **SSH Profile Management** ‚Äì create, edit, and delete multiple SSH profiles with host, port, username, and password.  
- ‚öôÔ∏è **Command Linking** ‚Äì attach any command to a specific SSH profile and execute it remotely with one click.  
- üñ±Ô∏è **Drag & Drop Commands** ‚Äì reorder or organize commands visually.  
- üß© **Profile Switching** ‚Äì change the profile linked to each command at any time.  
- üß† **Local Data Storage** ‚Äì commands and profiles stored in local JSON files.  
- ü™∂ **Simple, Fast, and Secure** ‚Äì all SSH operations handled locally; no external services or cloud required.

---

## üöÄ Usage Overview

1. **Create an SSH Profile** ‚Äì enter host, username, password, and port information.  
2. **Add a Command** ‚Äì link it to one of your profiles and save it for execution.  
3. **Edit or Delete** ‚Äì update profiles or commands anytime from the UI.  
4. **Drag & Drop** ‚Äì reorder your commands easily to keep your list organized.  
5. **Run Commands** ‚Äì execute any command instantly through the selected SSH profile.

---

### üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

- **Electron.js** ‚Äì desktop UI  
- **Express.js** ‚Äì backend routing  
- **Node.js** ‚Äì SSH connection handling (via `ssh2` library)  
- **Sortable.js** ‚Äì drag & drop functionality  
- **JSON Storage** ‚Äì lightweight local data management  

---

> üí° *CommandManager centralizes your SSH profiles and commands into one elegant, fast, and secure desktop tool.*

---

‚öôÔ∏è Backup your configuration files for installation to the another system:

`C:\Users\%UserProfile%\AppData\Local\CommandManager\resources\app\config`

---
